QuestData.Title: Leave No One Behind
QuestData.Description: Ahh, good. They sent someone.$b$bListen, $r. We need a hand here. Our forces were pushed back and we've lost Drak'Sotra to the Scourge. Where they came from is anyone's guess....$b$bThe point is, we need every man we can get here, and some of our best have yet to return from battle.$b$bI need you to enter the ruins now that the fighting has died down and find our wounded, patch them up, and bring them here to me.$b$bScour Drak'Sotra! They couldn't have gone far.
QuestData.LogDescription: Dr. Rogers at Drak'Sotra wants you to find Crusader Lamoof, Crusader Jonathan, and Crusader Josephine. Use the Crusader's Bandage on them, and escort them safely back to him.
QuestData.RewardText: Saved them all, did you? Outstanding!$b$bMaybe you'd consider sticking around the post here? We could sure use someone like you....
